description: List project transport plan stop order stops with filtering and pagination.
permissions: User must be authorized to view project transport plan stop order stops via access to the related project transport plan stop; authorization is delegated through the project transport plan stop to the project transport plan.

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-stop
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan stop ID. Example: --project-transport-plan-stop 123

flags.name: --transport-order-stop
flags.description: Filter by transport order stop ID. Example: --transport-order-stop 456

flags.name: --project-transport-plan
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID. Example: --project-transport-plan 123

flags.name: --transport-order
flags.description: Filter by transport order ID. Example: --transport-order 456

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-id
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID (via plan stop join). Example: --project-transport-plan-id 123

flags.name: --transport-order-id
flags.description: Filter by transport order ID (via order stop join). Example: --transport-order-id 456
